sentence: Kyrsten Sinema and Mark Kelly, Arizona Democrats, fired off a letter last week urging a go-slow approach and complained of “the lack of a specific plan” for handling the expected surge.
author: Stephen Dinan
title: ICE officers prepare for ‘massive crash’ in immigration system

title: Sen Manchin Calls Biden’s Rescinding of Title 42 “Frightening”

sentence: Kyrsten Sinema and Mark Kelly have since introduced a Senate bill delaying the end of the measure.

title: For migrants, desert journey remains ‘unforgiving’

sentence: “The Biden administration was wrong to set an end date for Title 42 without a comprehensive plan in place,” Sen. Mark Kelly, D-Ariz., said earlier this month, as he introduced a bill to delay that move.
author: Reagan Priest/Cronkite News
title: Border numbers hit highest level in 20 years, as end of Title 42 looms
